Package au.edu.anu.twcore.experiment.runtime.io

Class CsvFileLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.edu.anu.twcore.experiment.runtime.io.TableDataLoader
      • au.edu.anu.twcore.experiment.runtime.io.CsvFileLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MultipleDataLoader<fr.cnrs.iees.properties.SimplePropertyList>
    public class CsvFileLoader
extends TableDataLoader

    A data loader to load a csv ("comma separated values") file into a collection of (identical) SimplePropertyList objects. csv files are commonly used to export data from spreadsheet software such as OpenOffice-Calc.

    As csv is not a standardized format, we impose some restrictions on the format usable by this loader:

    • The file must not contain any missing value or structural empty cells.
    • Empty lines are permitted (they are skipped).
    • Default field delimiter is tabulation ("\t"), but any other character or character sequence is possible.
    • Text data must not be quoted.
    • The first data line of the file must contain column headers. They must match field names as defined in the 3Worlds specification dsl file.

    Since we do not allow for empty cells in the file, this means that complex SimplePropertyList constructs may have to be loaded from different files. In particular, a different file per set of table dimensions should be used. The match between different files is based on the TwData object identifiers they contain. For example, a TwData structured this way:

    double x;
    double y;
    MyDataTable z;

    with MyDataTable being a 2D table of 2*3 Integers, could be read from 2 files structured in this way:

    first file for x and y:
    idxy
    A1.02.54
    B12.03.84
    ...

    second file for z:
    iddim_1dim_2z
    A003879
    A014556
    A02589
    A102143
    A115486
    A125511
    B00865
    B01455
    B025895
    B102871
    B11849
    B12151
    ...

    Although not universal - this is impossible - , this csv data loader should be usable for most data originating from spreadsheets or softwares such as R.

    Author:
    Jacques Gignoux - 2/6/2017 refactored 9/10/2019
    See Also:
    TableDataLoader
